## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                          | Type                           |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `allowMultiple` | `allow-multiple` | Flag indicating if multiple `accordion-item`s can be open at once. Defaults to true. | `boolean`                      |
| `items`         | --               | An array of content displayed by the accordion.                                      | `{ [key: string]: string; }[]` |
